verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: am] [ARG2: cain a poem i am cain a poem i am cain and my altar does n’t burn oh it burns some as long as i ’m holding the lighter and scorching my thumb but it never catches on its own i went with my brother abel to the woods we gathered the same sticks we used the same amount of lighter fluid and his offering caught fire and multiplied abel started a cain abel facial hair]
